item.description:
Start your Sunday off with a brunch and a movie. Part of the Hartford International Film Festival


Directors: Cliff Bogart & Kyle Bogart US, 2009 | 119 min. Lab technician Virgil Gurdies embarks on an epic quest to create the greatest goat cheese the world has ever known, and reclaim the heart of his beloved Angie. A felonious German baker, a grave-digging hermit, and a tiny white goat color this journey of love, destiny and dairy products.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: HIFF - Artois The Goat
